name: Deckgeon (Space Otter)
description:
A non-competitive entry to weekly game jam #160, theme "Nothing lasts forever".

Deckgeon is a rogue-lite, deck-building, dungeon-crawler! Build up a set of powerful cards to help you make your way through a dungeon and collect ancient artifacts. However, monsters stalk the dark halls and want to take your life.

Controls

Ese WASD to move your player

Use 1 - 9 to select an inventory slot whilst inside the dungeon

Press E to use an item

Bugs

This is a game jam game, so probably won't be perfect! 

If you find any bugs in the game, please let me know in the comments on this page. Be sure to include what happened, what you were expecting to happen, and anything else you think might be important.
